Biology. Pine forest edge, stony slopes, steppes. Adults occur in V–VIII. On Caryophyllaceae :
Dianthus carthusianorum
( Hoffmann 1954 ; Smreczyński 1972 ; Lohse 1983h ; Dieckmann 1988 );
D. andrzejowskianus
,
D. borbasii (Isayev 2007)
.
